name: Just Another Day (mtpps1)
description:
"Just Another Day" is a visual novel about three unemployed friends. 

You get to watch their conversations and read their thoughts, as more about their relationship with each other and their past is revealed throughout the evening.

There are six endings. You choose whether you want to be friend or foe.

This is my first game, developed for My First Game Jam - Winter 2021.

Content Warning: swearing, mention to anxiety, depression, emotional neglect, intrusive thoughts and suicide ideation.

.

.

.

Disclaimer [mild spoilers]: the game's premisse is that the user can "choose" to be an intrusive thought or not. by enabling the user to "pick a side", I don't intend to make any statements about mental health issues. being depressed or anxious is not a matter of choice.
